reviews.review_msg:
I took ENG 4111 with Yiwen
I don't know why Yiewn is getting such a low rating on here. She will mark you fairly if you put in the work.

She claimed that buying 4 reading materials is not very expensive for a course. But the problem is the total amount of these books, time 4, is expensive. It can be up to 100 dolloars. And she also required students to finish 10 chapters of reading in a week, saying that was an easy job.

IF YOU HAVE TO TAKE GA302, PLEASE TAKE WITH ANOTHER TEACHER!!!
Lots of readings, most of it are book. Pop quizzes are normal if she feel you do not finish the reading before class (300 pages).
